definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: Seasoning the raw poultry for bourbon mustard chicken will lock in flavor within the meat.
sentences.chinese: 波旁芥末调味的鸡生禽将锁定在肉的味道。

sentences.english: Rye and bourbon are examples of whiskeys.
sentences.chinese: 黑麦酒和波旁酒是两种威士忌酒。

sentences.english: The Bourbon dynasty ruled France for more than two hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 波旁王朝统治法国超过两百年。
他喝光自己的第四杯波旁威士忌。

sentences.english: The French Bourbon dynasty is strong, even though Louis XIV is aging.
sentences.chinese: 尽管太阳王已经日显老迈，波旁王朝的根基仍然坚固。

sentences.english: The Bourbon dynasty ruled France for more than 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 波旁王朝统治法国达二百年之久。

sentences.english: At the Te Deum on the anniversary of the return of the Bourbons.
sentences.chinese: 波旁王室回国周年纪念日举行了一次大弥撒。

sentences.english: The bourbon dynasty ruled France for more than two hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 波旁王朝统治了法国超过二百年的时间。
他喝光自己的第四杯波旁威士忌。

sentences.english: The Bourbons carried away with them respect, but not regret.
sentences.chinese: 波旁家族带去了尊敬的心，却没有带走惋惜的心。

definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), kingdom during medieval period, now region of France
Brittany or Bretagne, area of western France
Flanders, region (state) of Belgium 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]

pinyin: Na4 bu4 le4 si1 wang2 guo2

definition: Cognac/brandy 白蘭地|白兰地[bai2 lan2 di4] from the Cognac region of southwest France
Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
